health_discussed_people_names: Hon Kibwana Swaleh, Hon. Mary Akinyi, Hon. Patrick Siminyu, Hon Amir Thoya, Hon. Karume, Hon. Mohamed Hatimy
health_data_challenges: Lack of a substantive Chief Executive Officer, Lack of detailed report on the number of people employed including those living with disabilities, Lack of gender balance in the Ad hoc Committee
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Confirm the Acting Chief Executive Officer, Employ more staff in the medical sector, Include persons living with disabilities in recruitment
health_sector_decisions: Confirmation of the Acting Chief Executive Officer
